description: This file contains functions and configuration data related to Rust target specifications and architecture feature detection, primarily focused on ARM and other architectures within a Yocto build environment.

methods.name: llvm_features_from_tune
methods.description: Derives LLVM features from the TUNE_FEATURES and MACHINEOVERRIDES environment variables.

methods.name: llvm_features_from_cc_arch
methods.description: Generates LLVM features based on TARGET_CC_ARCH variable.

methods.name: llvm_features_from_target_fpu
methods.description: Returns soft-float feature if TARGET_FPU is set to soft, for LLVM configuration.

methods.name: llvm_features
methods.description: Combines all LLVM features into a comma-separated string.

methods.name: rust_gen_target
methods.description: Generates a JSON target specification file for Rust based on architecture, features, and environment variables.

methods.name: do_rust_gen_targets
methods.description: High-level task that triggers the generation of Rust target specification files for the build architecture.
